action.action-desc: Mr. Ryan of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility of members of the National Guard for housing loans guaranteed by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Home Loans for Guard and Reservists Act.

section.header: Expansion of eligibility of members of the National Guard for housing loans guaranteed by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 3701(b)(7) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking full-time National Guard duty and inserting active service.
